argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | evlsrhm.q | |- Q = ( ( I evalSub S ) ` R ) |
| 2 |  | evlsrhm.w | |- W = ( I mPoly U ) |
| 3 |  | evlsrhm.u | |- U = ( S |`s R ) |
| 4 |  | evlsrhm.t | |- T = ( S ^s ( B ^m I ) ) |
| 5 |  | evlsrhm.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elex | |- ( I e. V -> I e. _V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mVar U ) = ( I mVar U ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( algSc ` W ) = ( algSc ` W ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. R |-> ( ( B ^m I ) X. { x } ) ) = ( x e. R |-> ( ( B ^m I ) X. { x } ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. I |-> ( y e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( y ` x ) ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( y e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( y ` x ) ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 7, 3, 4, 5, 8, 9, 10 | #P_evlsval2 | |- ( ( I e. _V /\ S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) -> ( Q e. ( W RingHom T ) /\ ( ( Q o. ( algSc ` W ) ) = ( x e. R |-> ( ( B ^m I ) X. { x } ) ) /\ ( Q o. ( I mVar U ) ) = ( x e. I |-> ( y e. ( B ^m I ) |-> ( y ` x ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( I e. _V /\ S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) -> Q e. ( W RingHom T ) ) |
| 13 | 6, 12 | #P_syl3an1 | |- ( ( I e. V /\ S e. CRing /\ R e. ( SubRing ` S ) ) -> Q e. ( W RingHom T ) ) |
